CustomField.description: If selected, weighting is applied to % Complete revenue forecast calculations for scheduled and actual hours on assignments and resource requests. Use the Assignment % Complete Weighting Field and RR % Complete Weighting Field settings to specify the fields you want PSA to use in the calculations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, weighting is applied to % Complete revenue forecast calculations for scheduled and actual hours on assignments and resource requests. Use the Assignment % Complete Weighting Field and RR % Complete Weighting Field settings to specify the fields you want PSA to use in the calculations.
CustomField.label: Use Weighting for % Complete
